^(createdAt)$.description: Time at which this credential was created, in epoch milliseconds.

^(fullName)$.description: The full name of the credential.

^(readOnly)$.description:
Whether the credential is usable only for read operations.

 Only applicable when purpose is STORAGE.

^(updatedAt)$.description: Time at which this credential was last updated, in epoch milliseconds.

^(updatedBy)$.description: Username of user who last modified credential.

^(usedForManagedStorage)$.description:
Whether this credential is the current metastore's root storage credential.

 Only applicable when purpose is STORAGE.

created_at.description: Time at which this credential was created, in epoch milliseconds.

full_name.description: The full name of the credential.

id.description: The unique identifier of the credential.

name.description:
The credential name.

 The name must be unique among storage and service credentials within the metastore.

owner.description: Username of current owner of credential.

purpose.description: Indicates the purpose of the credential.

read_only.description:
Whether the credential is usable only for read operations.

 Only applicable when purpose is STORAGE.

updated_at.description: Time at which this credential was last updated, in epoch milliseconds.

updated_by.description: Username of user who last modified credential.

used_for_managed_storage.description:
Whether this credential is the current metastore's root storage credential.

 Only applicable when purpose is STORAGE.
